column6: While Stark's wealth and influence is increasing across the globe, it could all still be undone by the ultimate betrayal. One of Tony's closest friends is working against him. She can see what he is becoming and is determined to prevent him from slipping even further. The Superior Iron Man could end at the hands of... Pepper Potts!
column8: | artist:Laura Braga | penciller (cover):Mike Choi | writer:Tom Taylor
